lead_paragraph: Hunter Cantwell threw for a career-high 340 yards and three touchdowns last night to lead No. 8 Louisville to a 44-17 victory against Middle Tennessee at LP Field, the Tennessee Titans’ home stadium in Nashville. The Cardinals are 5-0 for the first time since 1993. Middle Tennessee (3-3) fell to 0-11 against ranked opponents.
